original_solution_mapping.L1: It will take 4000 candies / 50 candies/hour = <<4000/50=80>>80 hours to make all the candy
original_solution_mapping.L2: It will take 80 hours / 10 hours/day = <<80/10=8>>8 days to complete the order

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1961.
    Returns: the number of days to complete the order.
    """
    # L1
    total_candies_needed = 4000 # produce 4000 candies
    production_rate_per_hour = 50 # produces 50 candies per hour
    total_hours_needed = total_candies_needed / production_rate_per_hour

    # L2
    hours_per_day = 10 # works for 10 hours every day
    total_days_needed = total_hours_needed / hours_per_day

    # FA
    answer = total_days_needed
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: It will take {total_candies_needed} candies / {production_rate_per_hour} candies/hour = <<{total_candies_needed}/{production_rate_per_hour}={total_hours_needed}>>{total_hours_needed} hours to make all the candy
It will take {total_hours_needed} hours / {hours_per_day} hours/day = <<{total_hours_needed}/{hours_per_day}={total_days_needed}>>{total_days_needed} days to complete the order

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: It will take 4000 candies / 50 candies/hour = <<4000/50=80>>80 hours to make all the candy
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: It will take 10 hours / 10 hours/day = <<10/10=1>>1 days to complete the order

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'hours_per_day' (value: 10) was used instead of 'total_hours_needed' (value: 80.0).
